Description_lang: Craft Primal Molten plate armor.
Increase your Ingenuity and Resourcefulness while crafting plate armor.
Craft a Master's Hammer, allowing you to freely repair your own plate armor.
Master the crafting of bolts of cloth and Polishing Cloths.
Master the crafting Contracts and Missives.
Consuming potions provide small bursts of movement speed or healing.
Craft bait to lure creatures that yield rare materials when skinned.
Master the crafting of Fauna Runes and Vantus Runes.

Customize mail armor you create with Optional and Finishing Reagents.
Customize rings and necklaces with Optional Reagents.
Prospecting allows you to discover Prismatic Ore, containing a hoard of gems.

Find magical seeds which can be planted in soil to grow herbs.
